file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: "API"
  version: "1.0.0"
  
paths:

  /polygons:
    get:
      summary: Test api which is designed for testing references to alias in models
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/Polygons"
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/Polygons"
                
  /coordinates:
    get:
      summary: Regular api which returns regular array
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/CoordsArray"
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "models.yaml#/components/schemas/CoordsArray"
